channel.title: I am having trouble with player rights and midfieing player stats
channel.description:
I have tried to modifie player rights and stats in the charecter file. What am i doing wrong?
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3289 character-posy = 3369 character-rights = 0 - I try to modifie player rights here character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070525 character-energy = 36 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 2184
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 1265 1 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 0 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 0 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 0 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 20 4475 I try to change skillz here character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 17 3410 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 50 character-skill = 14 18 3536 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
I modifie the file but the game doesn't change no playa rights or skillz changed. I even recompile it ,but it doesn't work. Could you please help me?

item.title: I am having trouble with player rights and midfieing player stats
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

The player has to be logged out and you have to save it.

Read full topic
item.source: I am having trouble with player rights and midfieing player stats

item.title: I am having trouble with player rights and midfieing player stats
item.dc:creator: @dawn_killer dawn killer
item.description:
@dawn_killer wrote:

I have tried to modifie player rights and stats in the charecter file. What am i doing wrong?

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3289
character-posy = 3369
character-rights = 0 - I try to modifie player rights here
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070525
character-energy = 36
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 2184

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 -1 0
character-equip = 1 -1 0
character-equip = 2 -1 0
character-equip = 3 1265 1
character-equip = 4 -1 0
character-equip = 5 -1 0
character-equip = 6 0 0
character-equip = 7 -1 0
character-equip = 8 0 0
character-equip = 9 -1 0
character-equip = 10 -1 0
character-equip = 11 0 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 20 4475 I try to change skillz here
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 17 3410
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0

character-skill = 9 1 0

character-skill = 14 18 3536
character-skill = 15 1 0

character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

I modifie the file but the game doesn’t change no playa rights or skillz changed. I even recompile it ,but it doesn’t work.
Could you please help me?
